page.title: 04Crafts- Bolton by Bowland
page.content: One lady in the village sells{soft {toys},which she makes herself.She does not sell them in a shop but in her car window.She started making soft toys because her mother used to.She also does embroidery.She makes toys every year,and has been doing it since she was young.She gets a lot of orders to make things,and in the end everything is sold.People come mostly in June and several come from foreign countries. Another lady in the area also makes dolls and soft toys. One man carves wooden{rocking horses and another is a{taxidermist}who stuffs dead animal skins. Several people do flower arranging,cake icing,and painting both pottery and pictures.
